question: Chris was a pen pal with 13 people. He stopped being penpals with 3 of them. They each send 3 letters a week that are 8 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 7 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Chris is penpals with 13-3=<<13-3=10>>10 people
Thus he gets 10*3=<<10*3=30>>30 letters a week
So he writes 30*8=<<30*8=240>>240 pages a week
So he writes for 240*7=<<240*7=1680>>1680 minutes a week
So he writes 1680/60=<<1680/60=28>>28 hours a week
#### 28
